title: I have completed my 10th physics syllabus. So should I start 11th physics or should I revise my 10th physics? - Quora

response.answer_text: If u r confident enough that u have good knowledge of 10th std Physics than u can start… or vaise b 11 std is quite different … so u have to spend a lot of time to understand it. Better u prepare now but with the help of a guide or friend…
Its your choice. Well, if you want to score good in Boards and want to qualify NTSE or any other exam then i suggest you to keep practicing 10th physics from many books. Like Trishna Pearson.
